attributes.action: Ban companys imposing additional fees on non direct debit customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition against BT SKY & Other companys who impose extra billing charges on their customers who don,t pay by direct debit.
BT Charge an extra £18.00 per anum for not letting them help themselves to your bank funds via direct debit.
this is an outrage & should be illegal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
